description: Represents the failure of a third party job as returned to the pipeline by a job worker. Used for partner actions only.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The ID of the job that failed. This is the same ID returned from PollForThirdPartyJobs.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The clientToken portion of the clientId and clientToken pair used to verify that the calling entity is allowed access to the job and its details.

parameters.name: failureDetails
parameters.description: Represents information about failure details. The type of the failure. The message about the failure. externalExecutionId (string) --- The external ID of the run of the action that failed.

nested_params.name: externalExecutionId
nested_params.description: The external ID of the run of the action that failed.
